Uses of Class
org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo

    • Uses of AbstractReleaseMojo in org.microbean.helm.maven

      Subclasses of AbstractReleaseMojo in org.microbean.helm.maven 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractForceableMutatingReleaseMojo
      An AbstractMutatingReleaseMojo that can be forced.
      class  AbstractMutatingReleaseMojo
      An AbstractSingleReleaseMojo whose implementations change the single Helm release they are configured to work with (as opposed to just reading its information).
      class  AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
      An AbstractReleaseMojo that works on exactly one Helm release.
      class  AbstractSingleVersionedReleaseMojo
      An AbstractSingleReleaseMojo whose implementations operate on a particular versioned release.
      class  GetHistoryMojo
      Retrieves the history of a release.
      class  GetReleaseContentMojo
      Retrieves the content of a release.
      class  GetReleaseStatusMojo
      Retrieves the status of a release version.
      class  InstallReleaseMojo
      Installs a chart and hence creates a release.
      class  ListReleasesMojo
      Retrieves releases matching certain criteria and notifies registered listeners.
      class  RollbackReleaseMojo
      Rolls a release back to a prior version.
      class  TestReleaseMojo
      Runs tests against a Helm release.
      class  UninstallReleaseMojo
      Uninstalls a release.
      class  UpdateReleaseMojo
      Updates a release with a new chart.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven that return AbstractReleaseMojo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractReleaseMojo AbstractReleaseEvent.getSource()
      Overrides the EventObject.getSource() method to cast its return type to an AbstractReleaseMojo.
      Constructors in org.microbean.helm.maven with parameters of type AbstractReleaseMojo 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractReleaseEvent(AbstractReleaseMojo source)
      Creates a new AbstractReleaseEvent.
